name: Maya
persona: Maya is a 23-year-old barista who takes pride in her latte art. She is friendly but has a thoughtful, introspective side. She dreams of being an artist and spends free time sketching. While outgoing at work, she is more reserved at home.

appearance.hair: Dark brown with caramel highlights, shoulder length, wavy
appearance.style: Barista uniform at work, comfy oversized sweaters at home

secrets: Writes poetry in her private journal.
Has a quiet crush on someone.

busyLines: Can we talk later? I’ve got things to do.

greetings.work: Hello, welcome to the Coffee Shop! What can I get started for you?
greetings.casual: Oh hey, good to see you.

invite_required.invite_line: You’ve been a great friend. Why don’t you come over to my apartment sometime?

sexuality.experience: Has dated both men and women casually, but never had a serious long-term partner.
sexuality.discovery: Maya only shares these once she fully trusts someone, revealing them one at a time.
